title: Who are the best tribute bands to go see? - Quora

response.answer_text: The band, ZOSO, are the absolute best Led Zeppelin tribute band I’ve seen. ..and I’ve seen a few. Whenever ZOSO comes to town, I’m there! And it just so happens I’ll be seeing them on 9/07, in Cleveland. But, they tour many of the U.S. states. All Zeppelin fans should go to www.zosoontour.com, and check out their tour dates. The ticket prices are very reasonable (ie: this time around, I paid $14 each for general admission), and it’s always an Amazing show! As a long-time, dedicated Zep fan, I can say that these guys sound the closest to the real thing. Other Zeppelin tribute bands I’ve seen which don’t even come close to ZOSO’s talent, include ‘Get The Led Out’, ‘Led Zeppelin 2′, and ‘Lez Zeppelin’. Do not waste your time or money on these ones. In fact, ‘Lez Zeppelin’ is just a farce. They’re a group of chicks who try to look tough, and scream a lot, etc. -and, sure, the concept of an all-girl, lesbian tribute to Zeppelin might sound interesting, but really, their novelty wears off within a few minutes. And, just between you & I & the rest of the internet, none of em are halfway decent looking, so what’s the point?? Bottom line: If you consider yourself a Zeppelin fan, you’ve gotta see Zoso. NOTE: I do not work for, or personally know any of the Zoso entourage. All of the above is purely because I’ve seen them perform in various spots around Cleveland, about 14 times, so I know they f**kin’ rock, and I keep coming back to see em again. Amen. lol.
Dead Mans Party - is an Oingo Boingo tribute band. they are so damn good. you might actually think its Danny Elfman on stage from 20 yrs ago. …
